title: An Ori Question
body: I've played plenty of Ori, but I can never remember to make a note to myself when it happens, nor will I remember to pick up on it the next Ori game I play. SO, could anyone who's 100% sure just confirm for me, does Ori's ball stay in place or go back to Ori once her shielded target dies?

replies.body:
[From Orianna's Wiki. ](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Orianna) 
> * If an ally dies while The Ball is attached to them, The Ball will remain at the location the target died.
* If Command: Protect is cast on an ally that dies while the ball is mid-flight or becomes untargetable such as with Zhonya's Hourglass, the ball will snap back to Orianna.

_**So yes and no.**_ 
If they die while its ON them - it drops to the ground. 
If they die in flight it goes to you
